nodes.text: The mind healer's grove, also known as the Spirit Healers' grove, was a cave on the Russet Slopes of the Old Paths on the planet Voss. The cave was home to ancient ruins, and was used by the spirit healers and dream-walkers of the Voss. The Child of the Sith Emperor Suri made camp in the cave while being driven mad by the injured Emperor's mental raging.
